name: POC - Feedback Loop with Deterministic System Control

nested.help:
The name of the relation property this property is responsible for rolling up.
 This relation is in the same database where the new rollup property is being created.
 One of `Relation Property Name` or `Relation Property ID` must be provided.
nested.name: relation_property_name
nested.label: Relation Property Name

nested.help:
The `ID` of the relation property this property is responsible for rolling up.
 This relation is in the same database where the new rollup property is being created.
 One of `Relation Property Name` or `Relation Property ID` must be provided.
nested.name: relation_property_id
nested.label: Relation Property ID

nested.help:
The name of the property in the related database that is used as an input to `function`.
 The related database must be shared with the integration.
 One of `Rollup Property Name` or `Rollup Property ID` must be provided.
nested.name: rollup_property_name
nested.label: Rollup Property Name

nested.help:
The `ID` of the property in the related database that is used as an input to function.
 The related database must be shared with the integration.
 One of `Rollup Property Name` or `Rollup Property ID` must be provided.
nested.name: rollup_property_id
nested.label: Rollup Property ID
